ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: When I haven't been able to smoke for a few hours, the craving gets intolerable.
I find myself reaching for cigarettes without thinking about it.
I drop everything to go out and buy cigarettes.
I smoke more before going into a situation where smoking is not allowed.
I smoke even when I am so ill that I am in bed most of the day.
When I go too long without a cigarette I feel impatient.
When I go too long without a cigarette I get strong urges that are hard to get rid of.
I am tempted to smoke when I realize I haven''t smoked for a while.
I crave cigarettes at certain times of day.
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 =A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: When I''m really craving a cigarette, it feels like I''m in the grip of some unknown force that I cannot control.
My urges to smoke keep getting stronger if I don''t smoke.
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 =A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: After not smoking for a while, I need to smoke in order to avoid feeling any discomfort.
My desire to smoke seems overpowering.
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 =A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: Cravings for a cigarette make it difficult for me to quit.
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 =A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: It is hard to ignore urges to smoke.
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 =A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: When I go without a cigarette for a few hours, I experience craving.
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 =A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I frequently crave cigarettes.
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 =A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: The idea of not having any cigarettes causes me stress.
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 =A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: When I run out of cigarettes, I find it almost unbearable.
I get a real gnawing hunger for a cigarette when l haven''t smoked in a while.
